name: Blessed Blade
text: [action] Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token is revealed during this attack, it deals +1 damage. When you initiate this attack, you may exhaust Blessed Blade to add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag. Instead of revealing a chaos token for this attack, you may resolve a token sealed here. [reaction] After you end your turn, if Blessed Blade is ready: Seal a [bless] token on it (limit 1 on this card).

name: Tides of Fate
text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window, or at the start of the round.
Replace all [curse] tokens in the chaos bag with an equal number of [bless] tokens. At the end of the round, replace all [bless] tokens in the chaos bag with an equal number of [curse] tokens. For each [curse] token added to the chaos bag this way, heal 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.

name: Hand of Fate
text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your or a connecting location.
Cancel that attack. Then, add [bless] tokens to the chaos bag equal to the attacking enemy's total combined damage and horror values. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Book of Psalms
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location. Add 2 [bless] and 2 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: Cryptographic Cipher
text: Uses (4 secrets). [fast] Exhaust Cryptographic Cipher and spend 1 secret: Investigate. [action] Spend 1 secret while Cryptographic Cipher is ready: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation.

name: Cryptic Grimoire
text:
Researched.
[reaction]: After you resolve 1 or more [curse] tokens during a skill test: Place that many secrets on Cryptic Grimoire.
[reaction] After you draw a copy of a card that is already in your hand, spend X secrets: Immediately play that card, reducing its cost by X. X must be at least 2.

name: Plan of Action
text:
If this skill test is during or before the first action of this turn, Plan of Action gains [wild].
If this skill test is between the first and third actions of this turn, draw 1 card if it succeeds.
If this skill test is during or after the third action of this turn, if it was successful, add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag for each point it succeeded by (max 3).

name: Under Surveillance
text: Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Uses (3 supplies). If there are no supplies on Under Surveillance, discard it.Forced - After an enemy enters attached location, remove 1 supply from Under Surveillance: Automatically evade that enemy and discover 1 clue at attached location. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

flavor: "Nothin's ever gonna be the same, Vito."
name: Tristan Botley
text:
You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat] and +1 [agility].
[reaction] After any skill test ends in which a total of 3 or more [bless] or [curse] tokens were revealed: Play Tristan Botley from your hand or your discard pile, at no cost.

name: Keep Faith
text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Add 3 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
You may remove 1 [curse] token from the chaos bag. If you do, shuffle Keep Faith back into your deck instead of discarding it.

name: Sword Cane
text: Playing Sword Cane does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [reaction] After Sword Cane enters play: Immediately trigger its "[action]" ability without paying its cost. [action] Exhaust Sword Cane: Fight/Evade. You may use your [willpower] in place of your [combat] or [agility] for this attack or evasion attempt. As an additional cost for this ability, you may return Sword Cane to your hand. If you do, you get +2 skill value for this test.

name: Abyssal Tome
text: [reaction] After Abyssal Tome enters play: Place up to 2 doom on Abyssal Tome. [action] Exhaust Abyssal Tome: Fight. You may use either [intellect] or [willpower] for this attack, instead of [combat]. When you initiate this attack, you may place 1 doom on Abyssal Tome (to a maximum of 4). You get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack for each doom on Abyssal Tome.

name: Priest of Two Faiths
text: As an additional cost to play Priest of Two Faiths, add 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. Forced - At the end of the upkeep phase: Add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag. If you can't, discard Priest of Two Faiths.

name: Butterfly Effect
text: Fast. Play when a chaos token with a symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location (before resolving its effects). Investigators at your location may commit any number of cards to this skill test and/or return any number of cards they committed to this test to their hand.

name: Token of Faith
text:
[reaction] After a skill test ends in which 1 or more [curse] or [auto_fail] tokens were revealed, exhaust Token of Faith: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
[reaction] After 1 or more [curse] tokens are added to the chaos bag, exhaust Token of Faith: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

flavor: Some people are just born under the wrong stars.
name: Accursed
text: Revelation - Reveal a random card from the pool of basic weaknesses, then choose one: - Add that weakness to your discard pile. Add Accursed to the victory display. When earning experience during the resolution of this scenario, you earn 2 additional experience. - Gain 1 physical or mental trauma. Remove Accursed from the game. (Do not gain the revealed weakness.)

flavor: You hear the sea calling, but you are strong enough not to listen to it. For now.
name: Innsmouth Influence
text:
Permanent.
You gain the [[Deep One]] trait.
You have -1 [willpower].
